pages.text: The witch is an illager that specializes in knowledge of alchemy; so much so, in fact, that their preferred method of combat relies solely on throwing harmful potions at their enemy.$(br2)They can drink tonics that heal instantly, so quick slashes with a weapon is the ideal way to dispatch of them.
Witches prefer to build reclusive huts where they experiment with brewing, found solely in swamps.

pages.title: Items & Drops
pages.text: On death, witches drop a plethora of items related to brewing and alchemy. Pretty useful knowledge, if I want to try my making my own potions and brews:
pages.text2: Witches will also burst into a horde of vampiric bats after being struck down that'll constantly nip and bite until they're taken out. Nasty stuff, I shouldn't let my guard down.

pages.title: Witch Hat
pages.text: Witches can also rarely drop their hat. It's woven with some sort of special fabric; it seems to be resistant to curse magic. This hat may also work in conjuction with an especially arcane kind of armor, theoretically. It can't be the one I'm thinking of, though; that material is nothing more than a myth...
